title: (x) Baskin Robbins ice cream label - Heatwave, Berthold Block, Gill Sans {James, Cerilene}
content:
I would like to know all 3, but the most important are the two largest. The smallest looks like Gill Sans Condensed or Quadraat Sans Cn.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/baskin.jpg)
author: signs79

comments.content: Looks like Pixie, and Block Berthold BQ Heavy. Not sure what the middle one is at a glance.

Could the “Mint Chocolate Chip” be Heatwave?  
 [http://www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm/sku/PN10131/playbox/true](http://web.archive.org/web/20060603021416/http:/www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm/sku/PN10131/playbox/true)
Middle looks like Gills sans Display compressed

Heatwave and Pixie are both digitizations of the same font.

See **[here](http://web.archive.org/web/20060603021416/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17428)**
